title: WCAS SPANISH 121-1-39 Intermediate Spanish
class_attributes:
Attendance at 1st class mandatory

One Addtl hour or more TBA

Prerequisites apply, see description

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
SPANISH 121

Communicative method. Further development of grammar, vocabulary, speaking, and writing skills through emphasis on cultural content and functional use of Spanish language. Three class meetings a week. Outside online video program twice a week.
Prerequisite: 101-3, 115-2, or Spanish Language Placement Exam.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Spanish 101-3 or 115-2, or online Spanish Language Placement Exam. Attendance at first class is required.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: For more information on the course contact the coordinator Deborah Rosenberg deborah-rosenberg@northwestern.edu

subject: SPANISH
